title: Clean Architecture in Java 16
subtitle: Practical Clean Architecture and Java Architecture training for developers
keywords: java, clean architecture, java enterprise architecture
metaDescription: In this practical 2-day workshop, you will learn how to architect and evolve clean, modular, and maintainable enterprise applications with Java 16, Spring, Hibernate and jOOQ. You’ll learn about clean architecture, enterprise architecture patterns, practices for keeping code quality under control, testing strategies and much more.
description: In this practical 2-day workshop, you will learn how to architect and evolve clean, modular, and maintainable enterprise applications with Java 16, Spring, Hibernate and jOOQ. You’ll learn about clean architecture, enterprise architecture patterns, practices for keeping code quality under control, testing strategies and much more.
audience: Java developers, team leaders, and architecst, with experience in enterprise software development.
certification: Yes, you'll earn a certificate of accomplishment.
language: The course is taught in English.
